title: Vampire Lust
description: Jack King is a handsome, crafty vampire who tries to maintain his identity in a time when the daily erosion of privacy is the norm. He has managed to survive a changing world for decades and now must face an age of rapid globalization, fleeting romance, and social networks.And just when his personal life takes an unexpected—and pleasant—turn, King learns his bloodline is worth a King's ransom. In a world where free markets and exploitation reign, one vampire is about to discover how mankind perceives his kind; as a monster, a commodity, or as a being deserving of tolerance?Part Three Description: Jack longs for a chance at a deeper relationship with Holly, a surprising set of circumstances might present him with such an opporunity, as Holly receives a chance at entering Jack's inner world. Meanwhile, Ted, his best friend and confidant, requests something from Jack that puts their strong and long lived friendship on the precipice. As Jack maneuvers through his interpersonal relationships, he faces a horror so frightening, it jolts the very foundation at the core of humanity.
author: P.J. Day
